name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering expertise, I excel in crafting scalable, high-performance applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**. I possess extensive experience in developing **RESTful APIs** and implementing **Microservices** architecture, ensuring robust and maintainable solutions. My proficiency extends to **Next.js**, **React Native**, and state management tools such as **MobX**, **Redux**, and **Zustand**, facilitating seamless user experiences. I prioritize security by employing best practices from **OWASP** and mitigating risks related to threats like **XSS** and **CSRF**. My solid foundation in software engineering principles such as **SOLID**, **DRY**, **YAGNI**, and **KISS**, along with design patterns from the **GoF Patterns**, guides my approach to developing high-quality software. Additionally, I am experienced in CI/CD tools like **Docker**, **CircleCI**, and **GitLab**, leveraging cloud services such as **AWS** (including **Lambdas**, **API Gateway**, and **DynamoDB**) for efficient deployment and scalability. My commitment to delivering enterprise-level solutions aligns with industry best practices, enhanced by my collaborative mindset and focus on UI component library design.
